
---
title: "sync_test_resources"
---

## Pipeline arguments

nextflow run \
https://github.com/openpipelines-bio/openpipeline.git -r main_build \
-main-script target/nextflow/download/sync_test_resources/main.nf \
--help

## Table of arguments

| name      | type         | description                                                                                                |
|:----------|:-------------|:-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| --input   | string       | Path to the S3 bucket to sync from.                                                                        |
| --output  | file         | Path to the test resource directory.                                                                       |
| --quiet   | boolean_true | Displays the operations that would be performed using the specified command without actually running them. |
| --dryrun  | boolean_true | Does not display the operations performed from the specified command.                                      |
| --delete  | boolean_true | Files that exist in the destination but not in the source are deleted during sync.                         |
| --exclude | string       | Exclude all files or objects from the command that matches the specified pattern.                          |
